website_summaries.verdict: Generally, the response for the Under Armour Charged Rogue Twist is mostly positive. A lot of the users commend the good grip that the rubber outsole of the shoe provided. A lot of them also really liked the integration Charged Cushioning® into the midsole, which increases the shoe’s responsiveness. The shoe, as said by many, provides sufficient comfort, especially during long-distance running. Some of the concerns of the buyers were the stiff heel and the thin padding of the shoe’s tongue.
pros: This neutral running shoe has good traction on varied surfaces, according to some runners
A number of reviewers say that the cushioning of the Charged Rogue Twist is very comfortable especially for long-distance running
One purchaser remarks that the shoe allows maximum flexibility
The Charged Cushioning® midsole of the Under Armour Charged Rogue Twist is lauded by a lot of people as it brings high responsiveness from the shoe
Some runners like the breathable engineered mesh upper of the shoe
A lot of the users also like the durability of the shoe because of its solid rubber outsole
The colorway of the shoe is appreciated by many
cons: The heel of this Under Armour running shoe is a little stiff, states one user
Some wearers mention that the padding of the tongue is too thin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes I wear a size 10 normally I got a size 10 1/2 to fit me well. Tried on in a store
customer_reviews.author: David P Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loves them! We tried on UA sneakers in a store to get sizing but he didn’t find a pair he liked. I found these, he loved the color and style so we ordered. They fit him perfectly, look great, feel great and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ACS, San Antonio, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker look, just narrower than I like and have to loosen most of lace to get on, but once on comfortable and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fantaroni

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They are a great fit on him too. Perfect quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bleh
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are sturdy feel great. Howe er the heel's cushion is defective as it can slightly less mass than the other one. Now one barely has any cushion because it folded up somewhere. I take my shoes off normal. Also had to replace my laces in the 2st week of wearing. I guess i got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but they run one size bigger. I wear 7 1/2 men’s had to buy 8 1/2 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky E. Fortner

customer_reviews.title: Best online shoe purchase I've made.
customer_reviews.text: I only wear them for running, but the comfort is far superior to any of my old running shoes and they are very light as well. Havent had them long enough to outline durability but if they last I'll purchase again next time.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable ! Bought a 2nd pair for my work shoes. I've been having bad pain with my feet and it's the only shoes that are light enough and comfortable enough to have stopped that! Definitely recommend if you're on your feet all day!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley87

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband and he says they are super comfortable. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and comfortable on my feet during and after my daily walk.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Pair of shoes I’ve Brought for myself. They are weigh so less and are highly durable. Perfect for as workouts and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Harish

customer_reviews.title: NEW FAV!
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker! Best cushion and support for working on feet and running around shop all day.
customer_reviews.author: JayLissBells

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and very comfortable running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It definitely upgrades my running experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Scapa

customer_reviews.title: Worst trainers I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn UA trainers for the past four years. This is, without a doubt, the worst pair of trainers I’ve ever had. The aesthetics of the shoe appear sleek at first glance, until you see the giant tongue tag. I have worn these for cross training workouts, jogging, and walking the dog around the park. In each instance my feet hurt within 30-45 minutes. I do not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Texan325

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Rogue Twist 3021852 Training Shoes
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need flexibility, cushioning & versatility
Engineered mesh upper is extremely lightweight & breathable, with strategic support where you need it
Lightweight, external heel counter for additional support that keeps the back of the foot locked in place
Charged Cushioning midsole uses compression molded foam for even greater responsiveness & durability, providing optimal cushioning & energy return
